title: 5-year-old struck by car on Navco Road
content:
MOBILE, AL (WALA) - 

A car accident in Mobile left a child injured Tuesday afternoon.

According to Officer Terence Perkins with the Mobile Police Department, officers responded to the area of Navco Road and Octavia Drive South in reference to someone struck by a vehicle.

Upon arrival, officers located a 5-year-old with head injuries. The injuries do not appear to be life-threatening.

That is all the information that is available at this time. We will update this story with more information as it becomes available.
